Staff-1.name: Chris Cooke
Staff-1.about: After gaining a degree in European Advertising and a postgraduate degree in Experimental Typography at the London College of Communication, Chris played a key role in the development of a variety of creative, arts and media organisations, including the famous music publications Mixmag and The Word. Chris’s skills include creative direction, branding and typography, information architecture and user-centred design. As Creative Director at Tilt, Chris has built a reputation for creating beautiful print and digital brand experiences for our clients. With fifteen years design experience, Chris now spends a good deal of time mentoring the next generation of young designers.
